PreToolUse.description: Remind about ElizaOS patterns when editing providers

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q 'src/providers'; then echo 'REMINDER: Providers should have name, description, dynamic, position, and get. See skills/toon-plugin.md'; fi

PreToolUse.description: KISS reminder when creating new files

hooks.command: echo 'KISS CHECK: Is this the simplest solution? Could it be a function instead of a class? Could it be inline instead of a new file?'

PreToolUse.description: Research reminder for external library usage

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'npm|npx|bunx'; then echo 'RESEARCH CHECK: Did you verify this package/command with Deepwiki first?'; fi

PostToolUse.description: Check for any type after TypeScript edits

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.tsx?$'; then grep -n ': any' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null | head -5 && echo '(any types detected - consider using proper types)' || true; fi
